* The gripper and object have an approximate friction coefficient of 0.3
* This grasp should set the goal aperture to 60.0 mm.

* Based on object mass and friction coefficient, grasp should initially set the contact force to 0.5 Newtons.

* This grasp sets the force to 0.5, which is lower than the default initial contact force because of the need to perform a gentle diagnostic palpation of a potentially injured wrist, where higher forces could cause pain or further injury.
[end of description]
